Main.PROTOCOL: Выгрузка сведений о прикреплении граждан (с филиалами)
Main.Author: KRG-OVIS-0005\travis
Main.TITLE: Выгрузка сведений о прикреплении граждан (с филиалами)
Main.Description: Выгрузка сведений о прикреплении граждан (с филиалами)

Table.Script: SELECT Name + ISNULL(' '+ NULLIF(SOCR +'.', ''), '') AS [KlAdrNAME], CODE AS [KlAdrCODE], LEVEL AS [KlAdrLEVEL] FROM kla_KlAdr WHERE CODE LIKE '%00'

WITH tmp_MKAB( rf_AddressID ) AS ( SELECT rf_AddressLiveID FROM @MKAB UNION SELECT rf_AddressRegID FROM @MKAB ) SELECT AddressID, ISNULL(NULLIF(NULLIF(Appartment, '0'), 'не определено'), '') AS [KV], rf_HouseID FROM tmp_MKAB, kla_Address (NOLOCK) WHERE rf_AddressID = AddressID

SELECT AddressID, ISNULL(NULLIF(Number, 'не определено'), '') AS [DOM], ISNULL(NULLIF(Building, 'не определено'), '') AS [KORP], KV, rf_StreetID FROM [tmp_Address], kla_House (NOLOCK) WHERE rf_HouseID = HouseID

SELECT AddressID, LEFT(PostIndex, 6) AS [INDX], LEFT(OCATD, 11) AS [OKATO], ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) LEFT(KlAdrNAME, 80) FROM [tmp_KlAdr] WHERE LEFT(CODE, 5) +'00000000' = KlAdrCODE AND KlAdrLEVEL = 2 ), '' ) AS [RNNAME], ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) KlAdrNAME +', ' FROM [tmp_KlAdr] WHERE LEFT(CODE, 8) +'00000' = KlAdrCODE AND KlAdrLEVEL = 3 ), '' ) + ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) KlAdrNAME FROM [tmp_KlAdr] WHERE LEFT(CODE, 11) = LEFT(KlAdrCODE, 11) ), '' ) AS [NPNAME], LEFT(ISNULL(NULLIF(Name, 'не определено'), '') + ISNULL(' '+ NULLIF(SOCR, '') +'.', ''), 80) AS [UL], LEFT(DOM, 7) AS [DOM], LEFT(KORP, 6) AS [KORP], LEFT(KV, 6) AS [KV] FROM [tmp_House], kla_Street (NOLOCK) WHERE rf_StreetID = StreetID

SELECT MKABID AS [rf_MKABID], BOMG, ISNULL(LEFT(NULLIF(OKATO, ''), 2) +'000', '') AS [SUBJ], CASE BOMG WHEN 0 THEN LEFT(INDX, 6) ELSE '' END AS [INDX], CASE BOMG WHEN 0 THEN LEFT(OKATO, 11) ELSE '' END AS [OKATO], CASE BOMG WHEN 0 THEN LEFT(RNNAME, 80) ELSE '' END AS [RNNAME], CASE BOMG WHEN 0 THEN LEFT(NPNAME, 80) ELSE '' END AS [NPNAME], CASE BOMG WHEN 0 THEN LEFT(UL, 80) ELSE '' END AS [UL], CASE BOMG WHEN 0 THEN LEFT(DOM, 7) ELSE '' END AS [DOM], CASE BOMG WHEN 0 THEN LEFT(KORP, 6) ELSE '' END AS [KORP], CASE BOMG WHEN 0 THEN LEFT(KV, 6) ELSE '' END AS [KV], CASE BOMG WHEN 0 THEN DREG ELSE '1900-01-01' END AS [DREG] FROM @MKAB, [tmp_Street] WHERE rf_AddressRegID = AddressID

SELECT MKABID AS [rf_MKABID], ISNULL(LEFT(NULLIF(OKATO, ''), 2) +'000', '') AS [SUBJ], LEFT(INDX, 6) AS [INDX], LEFT(OKATO, 11) AS [OKATO], LEFT(RNNAME, 80) AS [RNNAME], LEFT(NPNAME, 80) AS [NPNAME], LEFT(UL, 80) AS [UL], LEFT(DOM, 7) AS [DOM], LEFT(KORP, 6) AS [KORP], LEFT(KV, 6) AS [KV] FROM @MKAB, [tmp_Street] WHERE rf_AddressLiveID = AddressID

SELECT N_REC AS [REC_N], LEFT(FAM, 40) AS [FAM], LEFT(IM, 40) AS [IM], LEFT(OT, 40) AS [OT], W, DR, LEFT(ENP, 16) AS [ENP], LEFT('@Document.COD', 5) AS [SMOCODE], VPOLIS, CASE dbo.CheckENP(NPOLIS) WHEN 0 THEN LEFT(NPOLIS, 20) ELSE N_BLANK END AS [NPOLIS], LEFT(SPOLIS, 10) AS [SPOLIS], DOCTYPE, LEFT(DOCSER, 10) AS [DOCSER], LEFT(DOCNUM, 20) AS [DOCNUM], C_OKSM, SS, LEFT(PHONE, 40) AS [PHONE], LEFT(EMAIL, 50) AS [EMAIL], LEFT(FIOPR, 130) AS [FIOPR], LEFT(CONTACT, 130) AS [CONTACT], LEFT(MR, 100) AS [MR] FROM @MedRecord, @MKAB WHERE PersonGUID = UGUID

SELECT N_REC AS [REC_N], DVIZIT, RVIZIT, LEFT(MCODE2, 6) AS [MCODE2], (select top 1 LTRIM(RTRIM(LIC)) from Oms_LPU where LPUID = (select top 1 rf_LPUID from hlt_Uchastok where CODE = UCHAST)) AS [OID_MO], (select top 1 LTRIM(RTRIM(MCOD)) from Oms_LPU where LPUID = (select top 1 rf_LPUID from hlt_Uchastok where CODE = UCHAST)) AS [PODR], LEFT(UCHAST, 10) AS [UCHAST], LEFT(DOCCODE, 11) AS [DOCCODE], COMMENT FROM @MedRecord, @MKAB WHERE PersonGUID = UGUID

SELECT GETDATE() AS [DateCreate], '@DateUnload' AS [DateUnload], '@FILENAME' AS [FileName], NEWID() AS [GUID], MONTH('@DateUnload') AS [Month_Ot], SUM(NRECORDS) AS [NoticeCount], @NUM AS [Num], CommonReestrTypeID AS [rf_CommonReestrTypeID], @Document.SMOID AS [rf_SMOID], YEAR('@DateUnload') AS [Year_OT] FROM [tmp_OPLIST], hlt_CommonReestrType WHERE COD = 'R_ARM_01_1' AND @Document.SMOID > 0 GROUP BY CommonReestrTypeID HAVING SUM(NRECORDS) > 0;

Param.ParamDefaultValue: SELECT ISNULL(MAX(LPUID), 0) FROM oms_LPU LEFT JOIN x_UserSettings ON MCOD = ValueStr WHERE Property = 'Код поликлиники';

SELECT ISNULL(MAX(Num), 0) + 1 FROM hlt_UchastokMkabReestr WHERE Month_Ot = MONTH('@DateUnload') AND rf_CommonReestrTypeID = @CommonReestrTypeID AND rf_SMOID = @Document.SMOID AND Year_Ot = YEAR('@DateUnload');

ScriptsBeforeLoad.Script:
SET LANGUAGE russian;
WITH XMLNAMESPACES('http://xml.softrust.ru/schema/AddoHtm' AS ns0) SELECT MedRecordID, ISNULL(CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="pol_n"]').value('(//@value)[1]', 'VARCHAR(20)'), '') AS [N_BLANK], dbo.IsVarcharDate(CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="adr_dat"]').value('(//@value)[1]', 'VARCHAR(10)'), NULL) AS [DREG], ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) UPPER(FAMILY) + ISNULL(' '+ NULLIF(UPPER(NAME), ''), '') + ISNULL(' '+ NULLIF(UPPER(OT), ''), '') FROM hlt_RepresentativeMKAB (NOLOCK) WHERE RepresentativeMKABID = CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="agent"]').value('(//@instanceid)[1]', 'INT') ), '' ) AS [FIOPR], ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) CASE LEN(Phone) WHEN 0 THEN OtherContactInf ELSE Phone END FROM hlt_RepresentativeMKAB (NOLOCK) WHERE RepresentativeMKABID = CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="agent"]').value('(//@instanceid)[1]', 'INT') ), '' ) AS [CONTACT], dbo.IsVarcharDate(CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="date_extract"]').value('(//@value)[1]', 'VARCHAR(10)'), NULL) AS [DVIZIT], ISNULL(CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="reason_1"][@state="checked"]').value('(//@value)[1]', 'INT'), 0) + ISNULL(CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="reason_2"][@state="checked"]').value('(//@value)[1]', 'INT'), 0) + ISNULL(CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="reason_3"][@state="checked"]').value('(//@value)[1]', 'INT'), 0) AS [RVIZIT], ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) FCOD FROM oms_LPU WHERE LPUID = CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="from_lpu"]').value('(//@instanceid)[1]', 'INT') ), '' ) AS [MCODE2], ISNULL(CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="comment"]').value('(//@value)[1]', 'VARCHAR(250)'), '') AS [COMMENT], Guid AS [N_REC], PersonGUID INTO @MedRecord FROM hlt_MedRecord (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN hst_ATTACH ON rf_MedRecordID = MedRecordID WHERE rf_BlankTemplateID = @BlankTemplateID AND CONVERT(XML, Data).query('/ns0:root/ns0:element[@id="smo"]').value('(//@instanceid)[1]', 'INT') = @Document.SMOID AND ATTACHID IS NULL;

WITH tmp_MedRecord( rf_MKABGuid, DREG ) AS ( SELECT PersonGUID, MIN(DREG) FROM @MedRecord GROUP BY PersonGUID ) SELECT MKABID, UGUID, UPPER(FAMILY) AS [FAM], UPPER(NAME) AS [IM], CASE LEN(OT) WHEN 0 THEN 'НЕТ' ELSE UPPER(OT) END AS [OT], CASE PATINDEX('[0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-9][0-9][0-9] [0-9][0-9]', SS) WHEN 0 THEN '000-000-000 00' ELSE SS END AS [SS], 2 - W AS [W], DATE_BD AS [DR], ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) CONVERT(VARCHAR, LTRIM(RTRIM(CODE))) FROM hlt_Uchastok (NOLOCK) WHERE rf_UchastokID = UchastokID ), '' ) AS [UCHAST], ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) CONVERT(VARCHAR, dbo.IsNumber(SS)) FROM hlt_Uchastok (NOLOCK), hlt_LPUDoctor WHERE rf_LPUDoctorID = LPUDoctorID AND rf_UchastokID = UchastokID ), '' ) AS [DOCCODE], ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) C_DOC FROM oms_TYPEDOC WHERE rf_TYPEDOCID = TYPEDOCID ), 0 ) AS [DOCTYPE], S_POL AS [SPOLIS], N_POL AS [NPOLIS], CASE dbo.CheckENP(N_POL) WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE N_POL END AS [ENP], S_DOC AS [DOCSER], N_DOC AS [DOCNUM], CASE rf_kl_SocStatusID WHEN 33 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS [BOMG], rf_AddressLiveID, rf_AddressRegID, contactEmail AS [EMAIL], CASE LEN(PhoneHome) WHEN 0 THEN contactMPhone ELSE PhoneHome END AS [PHONE], ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) IDDOC FROM oms_kl_TipOMS WHERE rf_kl_TipOMSID = kl_TipOMSID ), 0 ) AS [VPOLIS], Birthplace AS [MR], ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP(1) NULLIF(ALFA3, '') FROM oms_OKSM WHERE rf_OKSMID = OKSMID ), 'RUS' ) AS [C_OKSM], DREG INTO @MKAB FROM tmp_MedRecord, hlt_MKAB (NOLOCK) WHERE rf_MKABGuid = UGUID;

SourceTable.script: SELECT UchastokMkabReestrID AS [rf_UchastokMKABReestrID], MedRecordID AS [rf_MedRecordID], '@DateUnload' AS [Date], 'Выгружено в СМО' AS [Comment] FROM [tmp_OP], hlt_UchastokMkabReestr (NOLOCK) WHERE Filename = '@FILENAME' AND Status = 0
